Hmm.. I'm not sure.. perhaps creating a seconds list of formats supporting
=
user defined link semantics would be interesting as well. I wouldn't like t=
o
mix them.

Some falling into this category that quickly came to my mind:
=
- HTML
- Atom
- HAL
- RDF/XML, Turtle, N3, ...
- JSON-LD
- WADL/WSDL??


--=

Markus Lanthaler
